#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cmath>
#include<string>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int t,br;
string s;
int main () {
   cin >>t;
   while(t--){
     cin >>s;
     br=0;
     sort(s.begin(),s.end());
     for(int i=0;i<s.size();i++){
       if(s[i]==s[i+1]) {br++;i++;}
       else br++;
     }
     cout <<br<<endl;
   }

 return 0;
}
